text: National Airlines Flight 2511 was a domestic flight from New York City to Miami on January 6, 1960. The airplane was a Douglas DC-6 that exploded from a bomb when it was flying in the air. Everyone died from the explosion. Many people think that this was a suicide attack. == References == Category:20th century in North Carolina Category:1960 in the United States Category:Disasters in the 1960s Category:Aviation accidents and incidents in the United States Category:Mass murder in the United States Category:Murder in the 1960s Category:History of North Carolina Category:Murder-suicides in the United States
title: National Airlines Flight 2511
